alert.note: Alert for Red River (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 20 at 4:37PM CDT until April 20 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Red River County in northeastern Texas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 436 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Pattonville, or 12 miles northwest of Hagansport, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksville, Boxelder, Bogata, Bagwell, Detroit, Deport, Annona, Negley, Johntown and Cuthand. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
